channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: unionlabs /union
item.description: The trust-minimized, zero-knowledge bridging protocol, designed for censorship resistance, extremely high security, and usage in decentralized finance.

item.title: hoppscotch /hoppscotch
item.description: Open source API development ecosystem -https://hoppscotch.io(open-source alternative to Postman, Insomnia)

item.title: RockChinQ /LangBot
item.description: 😎丰富生态、🧩支持扩展、🦄多模态 - 大模型原生即时通信机器人平台 🤖 | 适配 QQ / 微信（企业微信、个人微信）/ 飞书（feishu）/ Discord / OneBot 等消息平台 | 支持 OpenAI GPT、ChatGPT、DeepSeek、Dify、Claude、Gemini、Ollama、LM Studio、SiliconFlow、Qwen、Moonshot、ChatGLM 等 LLM 的机器人 / Agent | LLM-based instant messaging bots platform, supports Discord, WeChat, Lark, QQ platform, OpenAI ChatGPT, DeepSeek.

item.title: CodePhiliaX /Chat2DB
item.description: 🔥🔥🔥AI-driven database tool and SQL client, The hottest GUI client, supporting MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, DB2, SQL Server, DB2, SQLite, H2, ClickHouse, and more.

item.title: labring /FastGPT
item.description: FastGPT is a knowledge-based platform built on the LLMs, offers a comprehensive suite of out-of-the-box capabilities such as data processing, RAG retrieval, and visual AI workflow orchestration, letting you easily develop and deploy complex question-answering systems without the need for extensive setup or configuration.

item.title: vercel /ai-chatbot
item.description: A full-featured, hackable Next.js AI chatbot built by Vercel

item.title: codecrafters-io /build-your-own-x
item.description: Master programming by recreating your favorite technologies from scratch.

item.title: mendableai /firecrawl
item.description: 🔥 Turn entire websites into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. Scrape, crawl and extract with a single API.

item.title: langgenius /dify
item.description: Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.

item.title: albertan017 /LLM4Decompile
item.description: Reverse Engineering: Decompiling Binary Code with Large Language Models

item.title: potpie-ai /potpie
item.description: Prompt-To-Agent : Create custom engineering agents for your codebase

item.title: Shubhamsaboo /awesome-llm-apps
item.description: Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models.

item.title: unslothai /unsloth
item.description: Finetune Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1 & Reasoning LLMs 2x faster with 70% less memory! 🦥

item.title: n4ze3m /page-assist
item.description: Use your locally running AI models to assist you in your web browsing
